<<<explanation>>>: The IllegalStateException is caused by the fact that you are trying to perform a network operation on the main thread. In Android, network operations are not allowed on the main thread because they can block the UI and lead to a poor user experience. To fix this, you need to perform the network operation on a separate thread. In the provided code, we have created a new thread for the network operation in both the constructor and the onStartCommand method of the BackgroundService class.
